title: [BUG] Installation of pycatch22 ends with exception for Python 3.8 and 3.9

labels.name: maintenance
labels.description: Continuous integration, unit testing & package distribution

body:
**Describe the bug**
`pycatch22` makes issues on Python 3.8, Python 3.7 works well.
```
Python interpreter will be restarted.
Collecting sktime[all_extras]==0.14.1
  Using cached sktime-0.14.1-py3-none-any.whl (15.9 MB)
Requirement already satisfied: numba>=0.55 in /databricks/python3/lib/python3.8/site-packages (from sktime[all_extras]==0.14.1) (0.55.1)
Requirement already satisfied: pandas<1.6.0,>=1.1.0 in /databricks/python3/lib/python3.8/site-packages (from sktime[all_extras]==0.14.1) (1.2.4)
Collecting deprecated>=1.2.13
  Using cached Deprecated-1.2.13-py2.py3-none-any.whl (9.6 kB)
Requirement already satisfied: statsmodels>=0.12.1 in /databricks/python3/lib/python3.8/site-packages (from sktime[all_extras]==0.14.1) (0.12.2)
Requirement already satisfied: scipy<2.0.0 in /databricks/python3/lib/python3.8/site-packages (from sktime[all_extras]==0.14.1) (1.6.2)
Requirement already satisfied: scikit-learn<1.2.0,>=0.24.0 in /databricks/python3/lib/python3.8/site-packages (from sktime[all_extras]==0.14.1) (0.24.1)
Collecting numpy<1.23,>=1.21.0
  Using cached numpy-1.22.4-cp38-cp38-manylinux_2_17_x86_64.manylinux2014_x86_64.whl (16.9 MB)
Collecting gluonts>=0.9.0
  Using cached gluonts-0.11.4-py3-none-any.whl (1.0 MB)
Collecting pycatch22
  Using cached pycatch22-0.4.2.tar.gz (49 kB)
  Installing build dependencies: started
  Installing build dependencies: finished with status 'done'

  Getting requirements to build wheel: finished with status 'done'
  Installing backend dependencies: started
  Installing backend dependencies: finished with status 'done'
    Preparing wheel metadata: started
    Preparing wheel metadata: finished with status 'done'
  WARNING: Generating metadata for package pycatch22 produced metadata for project name unknown. Fix your #egg=pycatch22 fragments.
WARNING: Discarding https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/f4/7f/e0083a771ecefe10a0fd7b37d9be15adceec16648ed1a81625ade312d23c/pycatch22-0.4.2.tar.gz#sha256=162bd9774a326993c564120221e779fb6e578139e9fb73ed6066a3137e61c3ad (from https://pypi.org/simple/pycatch22/). Requested unknown from https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/f4/7f/e0083a771ecefe10a0fd7b37d9be15adceec16648ed1a81625ade312d23c/pycatch22-0.4.2.tar.gz#sha256=162bd9774a326993c564120221e779fb6e578139e9fb73ed6066a3137e61c3ad (from sktime[all_extras]==0.14.1) has inconsistent name: filename has 'pycatch22', but metadata has 'UNKNOWN'
  Using cached pycatch22-0.4.1.tar.gz (41 kB)
  Installing build dependencies: started
  Installing build dependencies: finished with status 'done'
  Getting requirements to build wheel: started
  Getting requirements to build wheel: finished with status 'done'
  Installing backend dependencies: started
  Installing backend dependencies: finished with status 'done'
    Preparing wheel metadata: started
    Preparing wheel metadata: finished with status 'done'
WARNING: Discarding https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/f8/d9/5beac06dce706d96c8b3a5f12352af61e323399af71f27556804b990ad25/pycatch22-0.4.1.tar.gz#sha256=2ef4895b5e8120abf2ecb0dcea49a65e3d03b3e6b3a1b905928b4b1856be9ec7 (from https://pypi.org/simple/pycatch22/). Requested pycatch22 from https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/f8/d9/5beac06dce706d96c8b3a5f12352af61e323399af71f27556804b990ad25/pycatch22-0.4.1.tar.gz#sha256=2ef4895b5e8120abf2ecb0dcea49a65e3d03b3e6b3a1b905928b4b1856be9ec7 (from sktime[all_extras]==0.14.1) has inconsistent version: filename has '0.4.1', but metadata has '0.0.0'
  Using cached pycatch22-0.2.0.tar.gz (44 kB)
  Installing build dependencies: started
  Installing build dependencies: finished with status 'done'
  Getting requirements to build wheel: started
  Getting requirements to build wheel: finished with status 'done'
  Installing backend dependencies: started
  Installing backend dependencies: finished with status 'done'

    Preparing wheel metadata: finished with status 'done'

ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement pycatch22; extra == "all_extras" (from sktime[all-extras])
ERROR: No matching distribution found for pycatch22; extra == "all_extras"
```
**To Reproduce**
`%pip install sktime[all_extras]==0.14.1`

**Expected behavior**
<!--
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
-->

**Additional context**
<!--
Add any other context about the problem here.
-->

**Versions**
System: Unix (Databricks LTS 10.4)
Python: 3.8 and 3.9. Probably 3.10 also fails, but I didnt test
